title: Santuario di Fondo Patturelli
description: A Samnite sanctuary of ancient Capua that was initially discovered in 1845. Active from the sixth century B.C. until the first century B.C., the Santuario di Fondo Patturelli is noted for its architectural terracotta as well as for the presence of a sacred maternal cult.

properties.description: Location of modern associated location based on OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of Curti
